rooms.description: Spacious entrance with foyer leading to living areas and staircase.
Vastu-aligned living room with West exposure ensuring balanced energy flow. Ample windows for natural light.
Efficient kitchen layout, placed towards the east to promote morning light and auspiciousness.
Adjacent to the living room for easy access during family meals.
Quiet workspace with a windowed design and Vastu-compliant placement.
Small bedroom for domestic staff with privacy.
Covered parking area with additional storage space.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring auspicious energy flow, Vastu compliant.
Large windows for natural light and ventilation in living spaces and kitchen.
Balconies attached to each bedroom offering outdoor views and fresh air.
Side entry for service areas, aligned with Vastu guidelines for auxiliary spaces.
